hero.title: OminiFinance
hero.subtitle: Cross-Chain DeFi Platform
hero.description: The ultimate interoperability solution built on Cosmos, connecting all major blockchain ecosystems through advanced IBC technology.

about.title: Unified Multi-Chain Finance
about.description: OminiFinance revolutionizes DeFi by creating seamless connections between isolated blockchain ecosystems.

crossChainSwapsDescription: Trade assets across different blockchains without wrapping or intermediaries.
yieldAggregationDescription: Access the best yields across multiple chains from a single interface.
ibcNativeDescription: Built on Cosmos SDK with native Inter-Blockchain Communication support.
cosmosDescription: OminiFinance leverages Cosmos SDK and Tendermint consensus to deliver enterprise-grade performance and unmatched cross-chain capabilities.
cosmosFeature1: Instant transaction finality with Tendermint BFT
cosmosFeature2: Native IBC protocol for seamless chain communication
cosmosFeature3: Modular architecture for easy upgrades and customization
cosmosWhyDescription: Cosmos is the Internet of Blockchains - an ecosystem of interconnected, sovereign chains that can exchange value and data through IBC.
cosmosForDevelopers: Cosmos SDK provides the most flexible framework for building application-specific blockchains.
cosmosForUsers: Experience true interoperability without wrapped assets or centralized bridges.
cosmosForEcosystem: Shared security model and growing network of interconnected chains.
connectedEcosystemDescription: Native support for 50+ IBC-enabled chains and secure bridges to major networks.
ctaDescription: Join thousands of users managing assets across multiple blockchains with OminiFinance.

footer.about: The ultimate cross-chain DeFi platform built on Cosmos.
